recommended_degree: Teknik Mesin, Teknik Elektro, Teknik Biomedis, Teknik Industri, Teknik Manufaktur (Sarjana)
job_description:
Join us as a Project Engineering Intern to support the team in coordinating project activities and maintaining accurate project documentation. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Assisting in tracking project progress and updating status reports.
2. Supporting the Project Engineers with daily coordination and follow-ups.
3. Helping maintain project data and timelines using tools such as Monday.com.
4. Preparing basic documents, summaries, and administrative support related to project activities.

This position is ideal for graduates who are interested in project coordination and gaining hands-on experience in a structured project environment.
